byline.contributor: Rebekah Zemansky reported from Mesa, and Ashley Southall from New York. Richard Pérez-Peña contributed reporting from New York.
byline.original: By REBEKAH ZEMANSKY and ASHLEY SOUTHALL

abstract: Mesa, Ariz, police say suspected gunman Ryan E Giroux went on deadly rampage, starting at Tri-City Inn, killing one man and wounding at least five others before being captured.
lead_paragraph: Hours after the rampage began on Wednesday, the police arrested a man just blocks from the site of the first shooting in Mesa, Ariz.

headline.main: Suspect Is Captured After Rampage in Mesa, Ariz., Leaves One Man Dead
headline.print_headline: Suspect Is Captured After Rampage in Mesa, Ariz., Leaves One Man Dead

snippet: Hours after the rampage began on Wednesday, the police arrested a man just blocks from the site of the first shooting in Mesa, Ariz.
